event_description: COVID cyber-threat surge (increased demand for remote security)
Series B $75M funding closed (investor confidence boost)
Acquisition of networking startup (expanded product portfolio)
Launch of ransomware-response module (market reception positive)
Fake threat-report scandal revealed (FTC investigation starts
Acquisition of DeepBlue Forensics LLC (DFIR capabilities added)
Secure browser plugin collaboration with Mozilla (privacy focus)
Signed-update supply-chain breach disclosed (stock dip from trust issues)
“Tri-Forge” JV with C003 & C002 signed (challenge hyperscalers)
Price-war retaliation against CrowdStrike (temporary margin hit but volume gain)
Current post-JV stability (cumulative growth from recovery)
